defitem.label: Processed by: John M. Jackson, Archivist,

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and University Archives, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: This collections consists of an account book maintained by Wiley B. King, a general store merchant in Poplar Hill (Giles County), Virginia. The book contains customer names, dates of purchases, goods purchased, and prices paid.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Reproduction and Use
userestrict.p: The copyright status of this collection is unknown. Copyright restrictions may apply. Contact Special Collections and University Archives for assistance in determining the use of these materials. Reproduction or digitization of materials for personal or research use can be requested using our reproduction/digitization form: http://bit.ly/scuareproduction. Reproduction or digitization of materials for publication or exhibit use can be requested using our publication/exhibition form: http://bit.ly/scuapublication. Please contact Special Collections and University Archives (specref@vt.edu or 540-231-6308) if you need assistance with forms or to submit a completed form.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: [identification of item], [box], [folder], Wiley B. King Account Book, Ms1940-018, Special Collections and University Archives, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Wiley B. King Account Book was acquired by the University Libraries in 1940 and transferred to Special Collections and University Archives.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing and description of the Wiley B. King Account Book commenced and was completed in April 2011. Initial description was completed in or prior to May 1970.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Wiley Banks King, son of Thomas B. and Sallie Eaton King, was born on October 17, 1881. He entered into business with his father under the name King & Son, which operated at Poplar Hill (Giles County), Virginia. By 1911, the business was operated solely under the name of W. B. King, and by 1917 had ceased operation. King married Martha K. Shannon (1882-1960) in 1904, and the couple would have five children. W. B. King died on May 2, 1957, and is buried in Giles County's Shannon-King Cemetery.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collections consists of an account book maintained by Wiley B. King, a general store merchant in Poplar Hill (Giles County), Virginia. The book contains customer names, dates of purchases, goods purchased, and prices paid.

odd.head: Rights Statement for Archival Description
odd.p: The guide to the Wiley B. King Account Book by Special Collections and University Archives, Virginia Tech, is licensed under a CC0 (https://creativecommons.org/share-your- work/public-domain/cc0/).
